articles.title: Homeopathic Doctor Arrested for Selling Fake Covid-19 Vaccines - Courthouse News Service
articles.description: The Napa-based naturopathic doctor allegedly sold unapproved vaccines for Covid-19 and childhood illnesses that she falsely claimed would satisfy immunization requirements for California schools.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO (CN) A homeopathic doctor in Northern Californias wine country was arrested Wednesday for allegedly selling unapproved, natural-based Covid-19 immunizations and telling patients to fals… [+5337 chars]
